name: The Ogi
description:
Controls:
WASD - Movement
M - Map
Space - Further dialogue
Mouse wheel - Zoom

Help section:
- Keep in mind, the WebGL game takes some time to load, it may hang on a black screen or the loading circle, be patient =)! (also maybe try different browsers)
* I cannot move! (WebGL) -> Try to refresh the browser or prevent fullscreening the game. Clicking the game window might also help to focus the game!

Credits:

Music and Sound Design - Miguel Inês (https://soundcloud.com/miguelines)

Artwork - spacenerdy (https://spacenerdy.carrd.co/)

Code - Jannick Drews (Default)

Player animations - Indigaya
